page.title: 10DAWSON FAMILY MUM/DAUGHTER
page.content: Ruth got up at 8.00am.She had break -fast.At 9.00am.she went to the school Hockey Tournament.At 9.30am.the games started.At 12.30pm.Ruth went home and got ready for ballet at Farnsfield. When Ruth got back she she had lunch and went to a Scout Gala.She got back home at 5.30pm.Ruth had tea,watched television till 8.30pm.Then she went to bed. Mum got up at 8.30am.She dressed,had breakfast and did the washing.She went to the Hockey Tournament.She played Hockey and went home.Mum drove Ruth to ballet.She went home,cooked lunch and got the washing in.Mum went to the Scout Gala.She made the dinner.Afterwards she watched television and washed her hair.At 11.15pm.she went to bed.{
